item.title: Code School - free weekend - Python course <2017-08-19 Sat>
item.description: Level 1 - 1.5 python variables cannot have a space inbetween or start with digits or special characters. pep 8 style underscore seperating words, more pythonic than camelcase camelcase is basically a capital letter separating words. Math Floor function is used to round down figures This is a test line import math num_macaws = 20 num_students = 3 macaws_per_student = num_macaws / num_students macaws_per_student_rounded= math.ceil(macaws_per_student) print (macaws_per_student_rounded) 7 Level 2 , 2.
